sentences.en: a vicious killer
sentences.cn: 凶狠的杀手

sentences.en: a vicious murder
sentences.cn: 一桩凶残的谋杀案

sentences.en: a vicious personal attack on the Duchess
sentences.cn: 对公爵夫人恶毒的人身攻击

sentences.en: A vicious price war between manufacturers has cut margins to the bone.
sentences.cn: 制造商之间的恶性价格战已将利润削减到了最低。

sentences.en: a vicious slander on the company's good name
sentences.cn: 对那家公司良好声誉的恶意诽谤

sentences.en: a vicious turf war between rival gangs of drug dealers
sentences.cn: 对立贩毒团伙之间的猛烈火并

sentences.en: Beware of vicious dog.
sentences.cn: 谨防恶犬.

sentences.en: He gave the dog a vicious blow with his stick.
sentences.cn: 他朝着那只狗狠狠地打了一棍子.

sentences.en: He is a wolf in sheep's clothing, outwardly kind but inwardly vicious!
sentences.cn: 他是个披着羊皮的狼, 外貌仁慈,内心狠毒!

sentences.en: He was a vicious gossip.
sentences.cn: 他总是喜欢说别人的坏话。

sentences.en: Keep away from that dog, he can be vicious.
sentences.cn: 离那只狗远点，它有时很凶猛。

sentences.en: Sarah can be quite vicious at times.
sentences.cn: 萨拉有时相当狠毒。

sentences.en: She has a vicious temper.
sentences.cn: 她性情暴虐。

sentences.en: She was furtive and vicious by temperament.
sentences.cn: 她本来做事就偷偷摸摸，心肠狠毒。

sentences.en: She was shocked by the vicious tone in his voice.
sentences.cn: 她对他恶毒的语气感到震惊。

sentences.en: Such a vicious lie could be nothing but a stab in the back.
sentences.cn: 这样一种恶毒的谎言简直是暗箭伤人.

sentences.en: The blow was so sudden and vicious that he dropped to his knees.
sentences.cn: 突如其来的猛然一击使他跪倒在地。

sentences.en: The drunkard led a vicious life.
sentences.cn: 这个醉汉过着堕落的生活.

sentences.en: The Home Secretary aims to break the vicious circle between disadvantage and crime.
sentences.cn: 内政大臣力图打破贫困和犯罪之间的恶性循环。

sentences.en: What a vicious trick he played!
sentences.cn: 他的一手真毒辣!

sentences.en: Your vicious dog is menacing my cat!
sentences.cn: 你那条恶狗对我家的猫太凶了.

phrases.tran_cn: n. 恶性螺旋形上升；[经]恶性通货膨胀螺旋

trans.tran_cn: 邪恶的，恶毒的，有恶意的，凶猛的，有缺点的
trans.tran_en: very unkind in a way that is intended to hurt someone’s feelings or make their character seem bad
